content.rendered:
Our team specialises in providing marine warranty services for marine transportation of high-value and/or high-risk project cargo covering:

  • Suitability and Operational Condition Inspection of Marine Spread for Transportation of Project Cargo (Fit for Purpose)
  • Engineering Review and Approval of Sea-Fastening Design and Transportation Manuals
  • Load-Out, Stowage and Securing Approval
  • Approval for Cargo Transfer by Different Methodologies i.e. Float-On/-Off, Lift-On/-Off, Roll-On/-Off, Heavy Lift etc.
  • Transportation Route Assessment
  • Towage / Transportation Approval
  • Feasibility Studies and Risk Assessment of Sea / Road Transportation

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Warranty Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The AqualisBraemar teams of Marine Warranty Surveyors, Engineers and Master Mariners act to protect Underwriters’ interests or self-insured Clients. We provide independent third party review and approval of offshore projects.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Consultancy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar provide professional offshore & marine consultancy services. Our team of Master Mariners and Naval Architects has extensive experience of a wide range of activities from simple marine operations to challenging and complex offshore projects.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Transportation / Vessel Design
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar is involved in all stages of a Marine transportation project, from conversion of an existing vessel or the development of a fit for purpose new build. Rig Moves
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has a team of master mariners, rig movers, naval architects, structural engineers and geotechnical engineers specialised in rig move business covering independent technical assessment and verification, MWS engineering review, survey attendance and approval for ocean move, in-field move and installation, lay-up and reactivation of rigs.
